modules.description: This module loads and unloads LADSPA plugins from shared object files. It manages plugin instances using the `t` type, representing loaded plugins. Use it to dynamically access audio processing plugins at runtime.

This module enables introspection of LADSPA plugin descriptors to retrieve metadata (name, label, copyright) and port attributes (type, direction, default/min/max values), while also supporting plugin instantiation, port connection

This module provides core operations for interacting with LADSPA plugins, including version handling and descriptor management, while integrating submodules for dynamic loading and introspection. It defines key data types like `t` for loaded plugins and exposes operations to query metadata, connect ports, and prepare plugins for real-time audio processing. The loading submodule enables runtime access to plugins from shared libraries, and the introspection submodule extracts detailed port information and plugin attributes. Example usage includes loading a plugin, retrieving its port ranges, connecting audio buffers, and managing its lifecycle in a DSP chain.
